title: Challenger Ahri chroma pack
body:
anyone else think challenger Ahri would be good with a chroma pack that has:
green
yellow
purple
and blue colors

i mean Ahri will probably get a chroma for a skin sometime but it would be nice to have it for challenger.

replies.body: Arcade Ahri's Tails are already a chroma.

I doubt we'll see Chromas for limited edition skins any time soon.

If Ahri gets a Chroma it'll be for either Pop Star or Arcade.
